description.value:
You are skilled at getting up close and personal with blaster weapons. While you are wielding a blaster weapon with which you are proficient, you gain the following benefits:

  • When making a ranged weapon attack while you are within 5 feet of a hostile creature, you do not have disadvantage on the attack roll.
  • Your ranged weapon attacks ignore one-quarter and half cover against targets within 30 feet of you.
  • When you roll a 1 on a blaster weapon damage die against a creature within 30 feet, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1.
  • Grasping a two-handed weapon you are wielding in only one hand with your other hand no longer requires your object interaction.
